Description:
Location, Quality, Priced to Sell!
On offer is a beautiful triple frontage red brick home located in one of the most convenient pocket of Clayton South, set in a quiet and leafy cul de sac yet only minutes away from Westall train station and Springvale shopping central.
Featuring:
Roller Shutter all around,
3 Large bedrooms with BIR
Master bedroom with Semi ensuite
Spacious lounge
Ducted Heating
Quality timber kitchen with granite bench top
Separate meals area
And so much more..
Terms: 10% deposit, Balance 30/60/90 days

Description:
Great Position and Development Opportunity
Sale by Set Date 2/10/2012
Situated in a fantastic locale of Clayton South, this 766m2 approximately prime real estate is now available.
For all astute investors who want to build their dream home or construct multiple dwellings (STCA) this is it.
Renovate existing 2 bedroom weatherboard home for rental return or detonate and start over - the choice is yours.
Only a short stroll to Westall train station and local shops, close proximity to Clayton central shops and amenities, easily accessible to all major arterials, only a short drive to Springvale shopping precinct and Monash University Clayton Campus nearby - don't wait any longer and enquire with confidence today as this wonderful opportunity will not last.
Chien Le : 0403 342 809

Description:
Think BIG!
This traditional home on an amazingly generous block in popular Clayton South will prove irresistible for families who require multiple living zones, or savvy developers looking to build (STCA). Featuring a traditional floorplan and located close to shopping, schools and public transport here's an opportunity too big to ignore!
- Neat weatherboard home on immaculately maintained, substantial grounds
- Formal lounge with local outlook
- Suitable for large gatherings with both family and rumpus rooms
- Comfortable kitchen with solid appliances, storage and casual meals area
- Large rear garden with undercover BBQ area and powered bungalow
- Three bedrooms with built-in-robes
- Central bathroom
- Gas Heating and Split System cooling
- Single Garage + Single Carport
Additional Info:
Land Size: 766m2 approx
House Size: 15 squares approx
Age of property: 50 years approx
Heating: Gas Central
Cooling: Slit System
Council Rates: $1,200 per annum approx
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/75 days
Potential Rental Return: $350-$380 per week approx
What the vendors love about the house: Lovingly manicured home & gardens, great family location close to everything!
Huge development potential.
Clayton South Amenities:
Nearest Primary Schools: Clayton South, St Andrews, Westall, Clarinda, Huntingdale & Oakleigh South.
Nearest Secondary Schools: Heatherton Christian College, South Oakleigh Secondary College & Minaret College.
Nearest Kindergartens: ABC Clarinda, Sundowner, Tootal's Corner Childcare & Kindergarten, Westall, Kallay Street Pre-School.
Nearest Transport:
Train: Huntingdale (Zone 1), Clayton & Westall Train Stations (Cranbourne, Pakenham & City Loop lines)
Bus Route: 631 Southland S/C Waverly Gardens S/C via Clayton, 705 Mordialloc Springvale via Clayton South, 821 Southland S/C Clayton via Heatherton, 824 Moorabbin Keysborough.
Nearest Recreation: Clarinda Community Centre, Clayton Aquatics & Health Club, Several Golf Clubs and Libraries, Namatjira Reserve, Sandown Racecourse
Other Amenities: Australia Post, Newsagency, Pharmacy, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, Woolworths, Coles, Bunnings Warehouse, Monash Freeway, Chadstone Shopping Centre (Largest shopping centre in the southern hemisphere with over 530 stores inc Myer, Kmart, David Jones etc).
Insights: 22 Culshaw Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2012 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
$20,000 First Home Owners Grant & Full Stamp Duty Savings
The lucky purchaser of this apartment will receive a brand new apartment that is complete, save on full stamp duty and if a first home owner, you will receive your $20,000 first home owners grant! Call and ask me how today! Be quick offer only available until Early October 2012. No other property offers you more! These brand new 5 star energy efficient apartments with quality fixtures and fittings are designed by award winning Tract landscape architects. On level two, the north facing apartment with plenty of natural light boasts; 2 spacious bedrooms, master with BIR and large ensuite, living, dining and kitchen with Bosch stainless steel appliances, contemporary bathroom, laundry and balcony. Additional features include; reverse cycle split system air conditioning, centrally located security intercom, undercover parking space, storage locker and high-speed ADSL broadband.
Within only a few steps you are at Westall train station and close by are; primary and secondary schools, the grange reserve golf course, Clayton Rd shops, Monash Uni, Monash Medical Centre and much more!

Description:
3 Bedrooms & Own Street Frontage and Clayton Central Locale
Fantastic standalone unit, that is big on accommodations, features, potential and value. What more can you ask for? A short walking distance to Clayton Central, with all Shops, Hospital, Station and other preferred amenities within close proximity.
Features 3 generous sized bedrooms all with BIR's, gas ducted heating/cooking/hot water system, covered outdoor entertaining area and a generous rear yard to entertain friends or for the kids to run around. Less than 10 years old and showing all the youthfulness a property of its age should exude.
Whether you are an investor, first home buyer or looking to downsize this exemplary property will cater for all your needs. An absolute gem that is low maintenance and priced to create huge interest.
Other Features
: 1 ½ Remote Garage
: Covered outdoor entertaining area
: 200m2 Land.
: Top Quality terracotta tiles
Call now for further detail.........or you will be disappointed.

Two Brand New Designer Style Townhouses!
*Huge Stamp Duty savings apply.
To be sold off the plan with huge stamp duty savings and first home owner grant applicable are these beautifully architecturally designed double storey modern town residences offering great value in a convenient locale. Within only minutes of Clayton Central, Community Centre (inc Swimming Centre & Library), schools, train station and buses. With living room, large dining room, 3 robed bedrooms with ensuite to main, stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances inc dishwasher, contemporary central bathroom, 2 toilets, heating and cooling, water tanks and private courtyards with landscaped garden surrounds.

Description:
Move in and relax
This young quality architect designed townhouse offers you a comfortable modern and low maintenance living. Massive building area includes three good size bedrooms (All bedrooms with BIR and master bedroom with Ensuite and WIR) and three living areas. Designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and stone island bench top, open to a bright family area connected to the private backyard, guest toilet downstairs, remote control double garage, central heating, water tank, and so much more.
Fantastic location: minutes' walk to Westall Train Station, Rosebank Avenue shops, post office, primary School and College. Short drive to IKEA, Clayton shopping centre, Springvale shopping centre, Monash University, Monash Medical Centre and Monash Free Way.

Description:
Great Starter
Newly renovated and ready for your final touch is this three bedroom home in a quiet court location.
Featuring; newly polished timber floors, ducted heating, brand new modern kitchen with cesar stone bench-tops, glass splash-backs, fully renovated bathroom & toilet and a brand new single lock up garage.
With Bus stops nearby, close to Clayton shopping, train station and with within walking distance to parks, this family friendly area is a great starter, investment or easy down-size.

Description:
Plans & Permits Approved For 2 Huge Townhouses Ready To Build!
Fantastic development opportunity for this original condition 3 bedroom residence with plans and permits approved for 2 double storey townhouses arises in one of Melbourne's fastest growing suburbs with plans and permits all completed and approved. This rare residence set on a very wide frontage within approx. 1km to Clayton Train Station and surroundings including only minutes to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Community Centre is sure to get the blood boiling in any astute developer, builder and investor!
With huge re-sale values in the area as well as high rental yields, all the hard work has been already done, ready for you to commence construction in no time!
Currently featuring an original condition 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom, air-conditioning, separate living, dining and laudry areas, huge courtyard at the back for family and children.
Plans and Permit approved for 2 townhouses (25 & 23 square on each approximately) which both townhouses consists of 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom and double door garage. Plans and permits are available to view in office or by soft copy by email.
Land size = 698sqm(approx.)

Description:
Stylish Living With Perfect Location
This modern and spacious home begs to the owner occupier and the astute investor alike. Presenting two large bedrooms with built in robes and split system air conditioners, Main with stylish modern en-suite, study, large hallway linen/storage cupboard, spacious European laundry with space for washer and dryer, modern main bathroom, large kitchen perfect for the entertainer with stainless steel appliances and a fresh and welcoming open plan living dining area. All this finished off with quality window furnishings, storage shed in the back yard, large open balcony, secure underground parking and intercom security entrance. Comes with 5 years builders warranty in a high profile local and just minutes to Clayton road shopping strip, Station, Monash Hospital and University making this the property with the lot.
Call for an inspection today or projected rental appraisal.

Description:
Family Comfort By The Park
A quiet tree-lined street and Namatjira Parkland at its backdoor are certainly a highlight of this property, but that's not all this home has to offer a family. It presents in original yet excellent condition with a warm and inviting ambience for a family to move into and enjoy, while offering fabulous potential to gradually add some modern inspiration in the generous lounge/dining, open kitchen (900mm s/s stove) & family/meals area, 3 bedrooms and study. An enclosed outdoor area is a wonderful space to entertain a large crowd, adjoining a large games room which was previously the garage. The home also provides gas heating, air-conditioner and carport, not to mention its close proximity to schools, buses, train and lively shopping strip, cafes and restaurants

Description:
A Real Charmer
How refreshing to find a home that's so immaculately presented, that all the next family has to do is unpack and place the furniture. Its allure is immediate with a charming facade, inviting you in to discover polished floorboards highlighting the spacious living room and three robed bedrooms, sharing the family bathroom. The kitchen in is good condition adjoining the meals area and there's plenty of room in the backyard for kids to play safely and the covered outdoor area is perfect to enjoy weekend barbeques with friends. It includes ducted heating, carport and garage and is located just a few doors up from a park with play equipment, close to shopping centres, schools and buses that will take you anywhere you want.

Description:
A CHOICE IN 3!
Under Instructions from the State Trustees Ltd
Wonderfully positioned abutting parkland this original 2 bedroom residence situated on a generous parcel of approximately 617sqm provides an opportunity to explore 1 of 3 options, build your dream home, create a 2 lot subdivision or rejuvenate the existing residence to live in or lease out.. Whatever you decide you'll reap the rewards of this superb location with Clayton Shopping Centre, Station and Schools all at your doorstep.
Land: 16.2m x 38.1m approx.
Moses Sawiris : 0421 485 627

Description:
Buy Before FHB Grants End and Reduce This Price By another $20,000* One under offer and only one left, BE QUICK!
Save around another $15,000 to $20,000 (approx) in stamp duty by buying one of these modern townhouses before construction. More money can be saved buy securing on of these large townhouses at a discounted rate and enjoying the potential capital growth once it is finished. An inclusions schedule is available upon request offering another benefit which is the ability to alter some of the interior finishes to suit your own personal taste. There are NO PROGRESS PAYMENTS as all you will need is a 10% holding deposit and the balance is paid upon completion.
With their own street frontages and NO COMMON LAND, these luxurious homes will suit either a home buyer or investor that see great value for money and also an opportunity to get started in property with a new home. With a recreational park with children's play equipment next door, this is a great location to bring up a young family. Westall Train Station is only minutes away and Clayton Shopping Strip, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University are also close.
Each home consists of 3 bedrooms plus a study with built in desk (master includes ensuite), Laundry that leads into lock up garage, Kitchen (with stainless steel cooking equipment), meals/living that opens onto an al fresco entertaining area, upstairs includes bedrooms, a bathroom and a kids retreat. Other features include a 2500 litre water tank, a large garden shed for storage, ducted heating, secure lock up garage, 7 year builders warranty and the pleasure of being the first person to live in this brilliant new home.
* Subject to applicants First home buyer status. Please consult the www.sro.vic.gov.au State revenue office for more information about FHB grants and Stamp Duty Savings.
Kylie Sirianni : 0402 019 540

Description:
Off The Plan! Modern, High Quality Craftsmanship!
A perfect opportunity arises to secure this off-the-plan opportunity for this exceptional designer townhouse built to phenomenal standards situated in one of Clayton South's most favourable locations.
Appealing to homebuyers, downsizer's, young professionals and astute investors, this stylish and chic living set within walking distance to Westall Train Station and only minutes away from Clayton central, local schools and parklands, you will not find a better growth location!
Comprises: 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 bedrooms upstairs with ensuite (master with WIR), downstairs modern central bathroom, stunning porcelain tiles, beautiful chef's kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, glass splashblack, stainless steel gas appliances and glass splashbacks.
Extra features include remote controlled lock up garage, parking for 2 more cars on drive way, 2 x split system air conditioners, landscaped gardens, rain water tank, clothes line, storage cage and much more!
This property would be built by local builders with high quality construction and attention to detail with many completed projects in the area that we can supply by request.
Ground Floor: 107m2
First Floor: 60.1m2
Secluded Private Open Space: 190m2
Garage: 23.3m2
Total building area: 167.1m2 (18squares approx.)
Total land area approx 300sqm.
Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity for this huge townhouse!
Expected completion December 2012.
Disclaimer: We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document.
